All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadRequestException
Custom exception for handling bad requests (HTTP 400).
ConflictException
Custom exception for handling conflict situations (HTTP 409).
CustomErrorDecoder
Custom implementation of Feign's ErrorDecoder to handle HTTP error responses.
CustomInfoContributor
The CustomInfoContributor class is a Spring component that dynamically enriches the information exposed by the /actuator/info endpoint.
EmptyNotesException
Exception thrown when a patient's notes are empty.
FeignConfig
Configuration class for Feign clients in the MicroDiab project.
FeignExceptionConfig
Configuration class for Feign exception handling in the *MicroDiab* project.
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for mRisk application.
MicroservicesProxy
Proxy interface for communicating with microservices mNotes and mPatient in the MicroDiab system.
MriskApplication
Main application class for the Mrisk microservice.
NoteBean
The NoteBean class represents a note associated with a patient in the MicroDiab application.
NotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested resource is not found.
PatientBean
The PatientBean class represents a patient in the MicroDiab application.
PatientNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a requested patient is not found in the system.
RequestLoggingFilter
Custom request logging filter for the *mrisk* microservice in the *MicroDiab* project.
RiskController
REST controller for managing risk-related operations in the *MicroDiab* project.
RiskLevel
Represents the risk level associated with a patient in the MicroDiab system.
RiskService
Service class for calculating the diabetes risk level of a patient.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class for security settings in the mRisk microservice.
ServerErrorException
Exception thrown when an internal server error occurs.
TracingHelper
Helper class for managing tracing spans and tags in a Spring Boot application.
WebConfig
Configuration class for customizing Spring MVC web configuration.
